catalog_script_client.name: Set Title based on ReqFor (onChange)

variable_set.display_value: Requestor Auto Fill Read Only Func

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_9c6101f51bf745d062e50ed2cd4bcb33
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:866053441ba274108c5143f3cc4bcb9e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set Title based on ReqFor (onChange)</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

    //find requestor and populate the details of title from it
    var reqFor = g_form.getReference('requested_for', populateDeptDetails);

	//populate title field with requestors value, or make it empty if they have no title (just in case)
    function populateDeptDetails(reqFor) {
		if (reqFor.req_for_title != '') {
			g_form.setValue('requestors_title', reqFor.title);
		} else {
			g_form.setValue('requestors_title', '');
		}
    }
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-31 20:53:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9c6101f51bf745d062e50ed2cd4bcb33</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set Title based on ReqFor (onChange)</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="OneStream Access Request" source="x_apig_onestream_a">90eb291a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb5e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="OneStream Access Request">90eb291a1b7a451062e50ed2cd4bcb5e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_9c6101f51bf745d062e50ed2cd4bcb33</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Terry.Lillo</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-31 20:54:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Requestor Auto Fill Read Only Func">36bf0bc01ba274108c5143f3cc4bcb8b</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
